overview:
Fred Caballero (@fredchannel) is Co-Founder of StartupStay.com, a global community for entrepreneurs that travel.

He Co-founded the startup with his partner @FacundoV, with which he also started two other companies: Channelship Web Agency (in Dublin, London) and Bloggertone.com.

Fred travelled to over 25 countries around the world. He lived in Argentina, Spain, United States, Ireland and the UK. Heâ€™s been based in London for the past two years.

http://uk.linkedin.com/in/fredcaballero
